citation: Proclamation under the New Tax System Price Exploitation Code (Tasmania) Act 1999 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the New Tax System Price Exploitation Code (Tasmania) Act 1999

I, the Lieutenant-Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 6 of the New Tax System Price Exploitation Code (Tasmania) Act 1999 appoint the date on which the making of this proclamation is notified in the Gazette as the date on which a modification made by the A New Tax System (Trade Practices Amendment) Act 2000 of the Commonwealth to the New Tax System Price Exploitation Code text applies.

7 August 2000

W. J. E. COX

Lieutenant-Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

DAVID CREAN

Treasurer

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 9 August 2000

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Treasury and Finance.
